title: Conta – Cooperative Design Building Concept
description: A conceptual design for an affordable cooperative workspace tailored for independent designers and freelancers.
details: Conta is envisioned as a cooperative design building located in downtown Toronto, providing rentable office spaces and access to specialized tools and machinery like laser cutters and 3D printers. The architectural style blends Brutalism and Industrial aesthetics to stand out amidst modern glass structures, while harmonizing with the surrounding warehouses and factories. The design process included site-specific planning, mid-fidelity sketches, and a final concept that integrates organic and geometric forms to fit the natural landscape.
